Uses of Interface
net.sf.JRecord.Common.IFieldDetail

  • Packages that use IFieldDetail 
    Package Description
    net.sf.JRecord.Common
    This package holds Common code used in multiple JRecord packages.
    net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser
    This package holds Various CSV line parsers - classes to break a line into the fields using a field-Seperator String
    net.sf.JRecord.Details
    This package holds Classes that describe a Files Structure RecordLayout + the lines (Line, XmlLine) in the File.
    net.sf.JRecord.schema  
    net.sf.JRecord.Types
    This package holds Type-Definitions plus the TypeManager that is a repositry for all the Types.

      interface  AbstractRecordX<FieldDefinition extends IFieldDetail>
      Extended Abstract Record (Record-Schema) where you can get the Field Definition and Field Count
      Classes in net.sf.JRecord.Common that implement IFieldDetail 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FieldDetail
      This class stores the description of one field in a record (or Line).
